summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by including the new splash message text and removing the old string from the POST_LOGIN_SPLASH_MESSAGES pool. The diff also includes an unrelated change to project_state.json that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json) by adding/altering new_feature_requests entries (AR-1, AR-2) unrelated to the appâ€™s splash message behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to replace a specific splash message string in the fixed post-login splash message pool, and explicitly constrained changes to that single specified line. No requirement mentioned changing project_state.json or adding tracking entries.
